articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Turkish police detain four pilots over Ghosn's escape: NTV
articles.description: Turkish police have detained seven people, including four pilots, over the transit of ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn through Turkey after fleeing Japan on his way to Lebanon, broadcaster NTV said on Thursday.
articles.content:
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - Turkish police have detained seven people, including four pilots, over the transit of ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn through Turkey after fleeing Japan on his way to Lebanon, broadcaster NTV said on Thursday.
